resources.string:
JUGDROID is an application for the Android platform. It is intended to inform you about news, events and much more in your JUG.


This project uses powerful libraries:

Greendroid - Author: Cyril Mottier
ACRA - Author: Kevin Gaudin
AndroidAnnotations - Author: Pierre-Yves Ricau

Thanks for their respectives authors
Ooooops ! I crashed, but a report has been sent to my developer to help him fix the issue !
Ooooops ! I can\'t retrieve information. Please try again later.
For more information on the JUG-Montpellier, go to the JUG\'s web page:
Companies, agencies believe our approach and support us either by financial contributions or by logistical assistance. This page lists and thank all these partners.
